name: kecks
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
trousers: How do they walk in those skintight kecks?
underpants or knickers (= underwear worn around the hips and bottom): He hasn't had a shave or changed his kecks in days.
More examplesFewer examplesI like your new kex.She likes to wear a white T and combat kecks.The sergeant-major told him to drop his kex.How can you be dressed immaculately and then have some ragged old kecks on underneath?
